title: tidymodels Gallery
text:
Welcome!
This “book” is meant to contain patterns or “recipes” of various tidymodels tasks.

title: 1  Visualize Decision Trees
text:
library(tidymodels)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(rpart.plot)

class_tree_spec <- decision_tree() %>%
  set_mode("classification") %>%
  set_engine("rpart")

rec_spec <- recipe(species ~ ., data = penguins)

class_tree_wf <- workflow() %>%
  add_recipe(rec_spec) %>%
  add_model(class_tree_spec)

class_tree_fit <- class_tree_wf %>%
  fit(penguins)

class_tree_fit %>%
  extract_fit_engine() %>%
  rpart.plot(roundint = FALSE)

title: 1  Visualize Decision Trees
text:
library(tidymodels)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(rpart.plot)

reg_tree_spec <- decision_tree() %>%
  set_mode("regression") %>%
  set_engine("rpart")

rec_spec <- recipe(body_mass_g ~ ., data = penguins)

reg_tree_wf <- workflow() %>%
  add_recipe(rec_spec) %>%
  add_model(reg_tree_spec)

reg_tree_fit <- reg_tree_wf %>%
  fit(penguins)

reg_tree_fit %>%
  extract_fit_engine() %>%
  rpart.plot(roundint = FALSE)
